snippet: Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey said at a press conference on Wednesday that he would fight federal corruption charges that included bribery, conspiracy, and fraud.
abstract: Senator Robert Menendez of New Jersey said at a press conference on Wednesday that he would fight federal corruption charges that included bribery, conspiracy, and fraud.

headline.main: Verbatim: Menendez Repeats, ‘I’m Not Going Anywhere’
